official_title: A bill to authorize the project for navigation at St. Louis Harbor, Missouri and Illinois.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a navigation project at Saint Louis Harbor, Missouri and Illinois, in accordance with certain plans.
